item.title: Backing up NextCloud data with Rclone and Backblaze B2
item.description: We are going to use backblaze b2, cost is better then Amazon S3. To backup the data we are going to use rclone. We are NOT trying to do a full server backup, I can rebuild the server. We are only going to backup the nextcloud data directory. First we need a couple of items installed. + Install some prerequisites: yum install goland git -You should have setup backblaze b2, and created an application key.
